The ears are short and rounded, hanging close to the head. The eyes are dark and expressive, giving the dog an alert and attentive appearance. The snout is short and strong, typical of breeds like the American Staffordshire Terrier or Pit Bull. There are no visible patterns or markings on the head, which makes it stand out as a solid-colored dog. The overall shape of the head is robust and muscular, suggesting strength and agility.
